data.strFullDescription:
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2318480/extras/GetOffTheGround_Label.png?t=1711568755[/img]
Last Train Outta' Wormtown is a chaotic asymmetrical Sandworm vs. Cowboys multiplayer game, where the worm can only see players touching the ground.

[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2318480/extras/PlayAsPardner_Label.png?t=1711568755[/img]
Work together with your fellow 'pardners to complete the objectives, fuel up the train, and get outta' Wormtown! But beware, touching the sand will alert the worm to your presence. If you want to make it outta' Wormtown alive, you'll need to run, jump, climb, and use props to create your own paths through the treacherous environment.

[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2318480/extras/PlayAsWorm_Label.png?t=1711568755[/img]
Feeling hungry? Play as the Worm and stop those pesky 'pardners from leaving town. Burrow underground to traverse the map quickly before erupting from the soil to dive at your next meal!


[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2318480/extras/PlayWithFriends_Label.png?t=1711568755[/img]
Does your friend not own Wormtown? Are you a streamer looking for a fun game to play with your chat? With the Friend's Pass, they can join your private games for free! Simply download the Friend's Pass and hop into the fun!
data.strSnippet: Last Train Outta' Wormtown is a chaotic Sandworm vs. Cowboys showdown. The Worm can only detect players touching the sand, like "hot lava" with a giant sandworm twist! Work together, Complete the objectives, and get outta' Wormtown! - Or, play as the Worm and gobble up your friends!
